entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning then snow and local blowing snow. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Light snow ending late in the evening then clearing. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 22 in the evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
